alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 03 at 1:14PM MST until February 05 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO 6 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds gusting up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Judith Gap, Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...From Noon Friday to 6 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strongest winds are expected Friday night into Saturday morning. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Judith Gap.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for light or high profile vehicles and those towing trailers. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
